item.title: What Rewriting a 40-Year-Old Project Taught Me About Software Development
item.description: When tasked with modernizing a 40-year-old manufacturing system written in APL, I faced both technical complexity and organizational challenges that shaped my understanding of successful software development. This article shares key lessons learned during a four-year journey of rewriting critical legacy code while keeping a $10M business running smoothly.

item.title: Does current AI represent a dead end?
item.description: Eerke Boiten, Professor of Cyber Security at De Montfort University Leicester, explains his belief that current AI should not be used for serious applications.

item.title: Distributed Systems Made Easy: URL Shortener Architecture with .NET Aspire
item.description:
Want to master Clean Architecture? Go here: https://bit.ly/3PupkOJ Want to unlock Modular Monoliths? Go here: https://bit.ly/3SXlzSt Join a community of 1000+ .NET developers: https://www.patreon.com/milanjovanovic
Want to build complex distributed systems without the headache? In this video, we'll create a URL shortener from scratch using .NET Aspire, showing you how to properly set up PostgreSQL, Redis caching, and implement HybridCache for better performance. You'll learn how to wire everything together using Aspire's orchestration, plus we'll add proper observability with OpenTelemetry so you can actually see what's happening in your system. Perfect for developers who want to see how Aspire makes building production-ready distributed systems way easier than before.
.NET Aspire: A Game-Changer for Cloud-Native Development? https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/dotnet-aspire-a-game-changer-for-cloud-native-development
Check out my courses: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/courses
Read my Blog here: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog
Join my weekly .NET newsletter: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech
Chapters 0:00 What is a URL Shortener? 2:18 Building the URL Shortener API 6:38 Adding .NET Aspire orchestration 10:58 Implementing the shortening logic 19:10 Distributed tracing and metrics
item.author: (Milan JovanoviÄ‡)

item.title: Critical: .NET Install links are changing - .NET Blog
item.description: The .NET installers and archives distribution method is currently changing unexpectedly. This change may impact your development, CI, and production infrastructure. It is crucial to validate if you are affected and monitor for any downtime or disruptions.
